alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Oklahoma and eastern Canadian Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yukon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Bethany, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Woodlawn Park, Richland, The Capitol, Wiley Post Airport, and The Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 124 and 125. Interstate 40 between mile markers 126 and 151. Interstate 44 between mile markers 117 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
